short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides handy tools for students using Google Meet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds handy features designed for students using Google Meet

What are some of the features?
✓ Quick Google Meet links
✓ Wordle
✓ Screenshot pinned presentations
✓ Disable camera & mic automatically
✓ Message presets (Farewells)
✓ 'Google Meet' volume slider
✓ Chatroom
